item.title: Dragon Pickaxe [no models needed!]
item.dc:creator: @staypuff staypuff
item.description:
@staypuff wrote:

[center]
[/center]
Insert these into class8.java (client side)

if(i == ####) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[6]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 61; //Original Color class8.anIntArray160[0] = 925; //Color Changed class8.anInt174 = 2529; class8.anInt165 = 509; class8.anInt200 = 509; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt181 = 1070; class8.anInt190 = 200; class8.anInt198 = 1080; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Dragon pickaxe"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Used for mining.".getBytes(); }

Then, open client.java (serverside) and search:

case 1275:

And add: (after the break;)

case 8079: // Dragon Pick Axe PickAxe = 8; break;
(that will make the pick axe work while mining and get ores at speed 8, 2 steps faster then rune (i did this so i could make the dragon pick a lot more expensive on my server)

[if you want me to give you my genie legs or aura(green thing under my feet(comes in many colors & is good for clan wars)) just post a reply]

Read full topic
